0.1.1.en: Updated app image and forum link

0.1.3.en: Show error writing registers in flow card error output

0.1.4.en: Added datatypes to read register flow card

0.1.5.en: Added numeric result token to read register flow card

0.2.0.en: Added connection type to device settings. Added addressing option to flow cards. Fxed UINT16 Reading

0.3.3.en: Improved Deviced connection. Fixed Slave data type. Added reading InputRegisters

0.4.1.en: Added data type to write register flow card

0.4.2.en: Changed size parameter to optional value (only needed for STRING), Added longer timeout for connection

0.5.0.en: Added flow cards for reading Coil and DiscreteInput Register

0.6.0.en: Added new Types: little-endian (LE) for all typed, Removed FLOAT16

0.6.1.en: Fixed reading size for STRING registers

0.7.0.en: Added new Types: little-endian (LE) for 16bit words (1 register)

0.7.1.en: Added new Types to write register flow card

0.7.2.en: Fixed (U)INT-LE 16bit for write register flow card

0.7.3.en: Fixed size for read register flow card

0.7.4.en: Fixed init error of slave device

0.7.6.en: Splitted writing registers into single (16bit) and multi register action (>16bit)

0.7.8.en: Fixed Slave device flow action tokens.
